code: import axios from"axios";import{useState}from"react";import'../styles/Find.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Find(){const[id,setId]=useState("");const[employee,setEmployee]=useState(null);async function getData(e){e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/employees/").concat(id));setEmployee(response.data);}catch(err){setEmployee(null);alert("Employee Not Found : "+err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Find Record By ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:getData,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Id",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Find Data"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),employee&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Employee Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Emp No is : ",employee.empNo]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Emp Name is : ",employee.empName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Emp Sal is : ",employee.empSal]})]})]});}
